title: Wondershare Filmora v6.6.0 MultiLang Incl.Patch-MPT [deepstatus]
description:
Wondershare Filmora 6.6.0

Cut, edit, merge, and trim clips. Add music and text. Apply special effects. Get a professional-looking movie in minutes.



Ignite your story.
Use Filmora video editor to express your creativity and amaze with beautiful results.

SIMPLEÃ£â‚¬â‚¬EFFECTS

Expand Your Imagination with Over a Hundred Unique Visual Effects.
Wondershare Filmora allows you to turn your home video into something extraordinary with minimal effort.
Control the pace of your clips, to create a beautifully sped up time-lapse or stunning slow-motion effect.

ADVANCED EFFECTS

Expand Your Imagination with Over a Hundred Unique Visual Effects.
Turn your home video into something extraordinary with minimal effort.
Place multiple videos in the same frame! Layer many movies into one frame to tell different angles of one story.


SHARE YOUR CREATIVE WORK

Showcase your creativity with your family, friends and the rest of the world!
You can easily publish your masterpiece in so many ways.

Social Media Social Media
IOS/Android Devices IOS/Android Devices
Burn DVD Burn DVD

Instantly upload your video clips to social media, burn to DVDs for memorable gifts, & Optimize video clips for perfect compatibility with your iOS and Android devices.



Import media files
Drag and drop videos, audio and photos to the media library in Filmora or click "Import" to add file from your computer. Drag video, audio and photo files from the media library to the video and audio track on the timeline for editing.

Edit video, photo and audio
By dragging media file to the timeline, you can crop, rotate, trim, add caption, apply filter effect, adjust video effect, etc.

Add transition effects
Click the "Transition" tab, and drag your favorite transition effect between two clips. By double clicking the transition on the track, you can manually set its duration.

Create and share your video
After finished editing, go to "Create" tab. There are four ways to output your videos: Device, Format, YouTube and DVD. Select the proper one and click "Output" to save or share the edited videos.


Tech Specifications of Filmora for Windows

Supported Input Formats

Video Formats AVI, DV, DIF, NUT, H261, H264, NSV, FLV, MKV, MP4, M4V, PSP, 3GP, MOV, MPG, MPEG, VOB, DAT, EVO, RM, RMVB, TS, TP, TRP, M2TS, WMV, ASF, DVR-MS
Audio Formats AAC, AC3, APE, AIF, AIFF, FLAC, APE, CUE, AU, AMR, OGG, WAV, DPE, MKA, M4V, M4A, MPA, MP2, MP3, RA, WMA
Photo Formats JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, JPE, GIF, DIB, JFIF, TIF, TIFF

Supported Output Formats
Common Video/Audio WMV, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, MP4 Video(AVC), MP4 Video(Xvid), MP4 Video(MC), ASF, M4V, Xvid, DV, MPEG-1 NTSC, MPEG-1 PAL, MPEG-1 SECAM, MPEG-2 NTSC, MPEG-2 PAL, MPEG-2 SECAM, DVD-Video NTSC, DVD-Video PAL, HTML5, DVD-Video SECAM, MP3
HD Video TS, TRP, AVI, MP4, MPG, WMV, MOV
DVD DVD disc, DVD folder, ISO image file

Devices

iPhone, iPhone 3G, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5 C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus
iPod nano, iPod touch, iPod classic
iPad, iPad 2
HTC, Galaxy S II
PSP, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, Zune, Zen, Archos



System Requirements

Supported OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 1GHz or above
RAM: At least 512M physical RAM
